Bio: I'm a Computer Science graduate from the American College of Technology, where I discovered my passion for Machine Learning and Computer Vision. Currently channeling my curiosity into hands-on research initiatives and internships.

Founder and AI Researcher at Ethiopian Researchers. Software Engineer at INSA. I specialize in software architecture and design, with a distinguished academic record. Graduated in Software Engineering with distinction from Jimma University. Interested in AI, ML, and cyber security.

I am a final-year undergraduate Computer Science student interested in applied AI and computer vision. My capstone project explores teaching vision models subjective and high-level concepts using language supervision, and I am preparing for research-oriented graduate study.
Exploring computer vision, breaking models, and figuring out why they fail.

I am a System Analyst passionate about AI and data science, with experience in requirements engineering, project management, and data engineering. I am interested in developing practical, impact-driven solutions and conducting innovative research in computer vision.
